Subject: Loving Your Cosplay Body
Description: Just because you are not an exact replica of the character you'd like to be doesn't mean you can't pull off a great cosplay of them. Size, sex, race, or physical abilities should not hold you back from being who you really want to be. We will discuss how to accept, cover, camouflage, and overcome your body issues and cosplay with confidence.   Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden

Subject: Cosplay 101
Description: Dressing up really seems like fun. You've seen other people doing it and now you think you might want to try it yourself. I can provide you with some advice, tips, and tricks in order to get you on the right track.   Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden

Subject: Silicone Casting for Cheap Bastards
Description: Ever wanted to make things out of silicone but don't want to spend a bunch of money? Learn how to cast things out of inexpensive silicone caulk and corn starch.   Speakers include:Gnora Ford-Lepthien

Subject: Creature Costumes
Description: Learn various techniques to create non-human scifi/fantasy costumes. From scaly to fuzzy, find out how to create a werewolf, lizardman, fishman, insect, and more!  Speakers include:Gnora Ford-Lepthien

Subject: Cosplay Hacks Part 1
Description: Do you have a great costume idea but can't find a pattern or the ability to make it? I have some great advice and techniques that will help you get through it all. We will be addressing alteration of existing items or patterns, pattern creation, sewing alternatives, and some clever tricks to help you on your way. Part 1 of 2.  Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden

Subject: Cosplay Hacks Part 2
Description: Do you have a great costume idea but can't find a pattern or the ability to make it? I have some great advice and techniques that will help you get through it all. We will spend more time addressing specific questions and needs of the audience in a hands-on way. Part 2 of 2, attendance of Part 1 is not required.  Speakers include:Wendy Carson, John Belden
